title: Why Columbus Day isn’t really a national holiday (National Constitution Center)
text: ( Source : National Constitution Center ) This Monday, some folks will have a day off to commemorate Columbus Day and some won't. So what is the legal basis for the holiday and is it truly a national holiday? Officially, Columbus Day is
